title: Konna Amai Koto, Shiranai...
alternative_title: Konna Amaikoto Shiranai ; Suki to Kiss de Tsunagatte. ; Yoi Ko Warui Ko Itoshii Ko
status: Konna Amaikoto Shiranai ; Suki to Kiss de Tsunagatte. ; Yoi Ko Warui Ko Itoshii Ko
description:
Description :
        Rin was a certified yankee on her first day of High School when her brother dyed her hair blonde as a prank. On her way home, her hair got stuck on the bracelet of famous hair stylist Hanae!
With no way to free her hair from the bracelet, she ended up cutting her hair off!
Hanae said he’d take responsibility for damaging her hair... but what does that responsibility have to do with marriage?!
